title: Currency Converter
subtitle: Convert currencies and common units quickly.
paragraphs: Quickly convert between major currencies using live exchange rates, or perform simple unit conversions (length, weight, temperature). This tool is handy for quick estimates and learning.
Rates are provided by exchangerate.host for demonstration purposes. For production use, consider an API with guaranteed SLAs and handle rate limits appropriately.

faqs.a: We use exchangerate.host free API for sample live rates.
Rates are fetched live when available; consider API limits for production use.
The input supports basic unit conversions for length, weight, and temperature.
